dashboard.title: Dashboards
dashboard.description: You can view the out-of-the-box user life cycle dashboards here, and create a custom dashboard with exploration analysis.
dashboard.createInputNameDec: Please input a name for the dashboard.
dashboard.createDescDec: Please provide a useful description for the dashboard.
dashboard.createDescPlaceholder: E.g. dashboard for the e-commerce department
dashboard.createSheetsDec: One dashboard could have multiple sheets to group charts into different topics. By default, the solution create a sheet with “Sheet 1”  if you don’t specify sheet name.
dashboard.deleteTip1: Are you sure you want to delete the dashboard
dashboard.deleteTip2: delete dashboard will delete all data in QuickSight.
dashboard.defaultUserLifecycleDescription: Out-of-the-box user lifecycle analysis dashboard created by solution.

realtime.title: Realtime
realtime.description: You can view key metrics of your apps and website in realtime here.
realtime.disableMessage: This project has not enabled real-time dashboard, please contact your admin to turn on real-time dashboard.

analyzes.title: Analyses
analyzes.description: You can create custom analysis and dashboard in a drag-and-drop manner in this module.
analyzes.comeSoon: The feature is about to be launched.

explore.title: Explorations
explore.description: The Explore module provides a range of advanced analytical models to enable you to dynamically query and analyze clickstream data. Select an analytics model to begin.

list.noDashboard: You don’t have any clickstream analytics dashboard yet

metadata.description: You can view and manage metadata for events and user attributes here.

event.title: Events
event.description: This table lists out all the events in the selected App.

eventParameter.title: Event Parameters
eventParameter.description: The table list out all the Event Parameters in the selected App

userAttribute.title: User Attributes
userAttribute.description: This table lists out all the user attributes in the selected App.

valid.dashboardSheetNumError: The dashboard sheet can't be more than ten and can't be empty.
valid.funnelPipelineVersionError: Missing parameters, please upgrade the pipeline corresponding to the current project.
valid.dateRangeIncomplete: The selected date range is incomplete. Select a start date and a end date for the date range.
valid.dateRangeInvalid: The selected date range is invalid. The start date must be before the end date.
valid.selectTwoEvent: Query metrics error: Please select at least two steps
valid.retentionJoinColumnDatatype: Query metrics error: The data type for each set of associated parameter in retention analysis must be the same
valid.notSupportProjectOrApp: This project or application does not support Analytics Studio:

labels.pipelineVersionNotSupport: The pipeline version is not supported
labels.participateNodes: Select nodes to participate in the analysis
labels.groupApplyToFirst: Apply grouping to the first step only

emptyExploreMessage: There are no explore modules available for the current project
emptyAnalyzeMessage: There are no analyses available for the current project
emptyDashboardMessage: No dashboard data has been found yet
noDataAvailableTitle: No clickstream data available for analytics
noDataAvailableMessage: The solution did not find any project has clickstream data yet, please contact your system admin to start collecting data.

information.funnelMetricsInfo: Select an entity of the calculated funnel conversion rate.
information.funnelWindowInfo: The funnel Window refers to the time for the user to complete the entire process. Only when the user completes all the selected steps within the set window period is considered a successful conversion.
information.funnelStepsInfo: Select events as the steps for the funnel conversion rate.
information.eventDefineMetricInfo: Please select events, calculation methods, and filter conditions to query. You can add multiple filters for one event.
information.filterInfo: You can filter events globally by setting this filter, and this filter will apply to all metrics.
information.groupInfo: Metric will be grouped by the values of the selected event parameter.
information.pathMetricsInfo: Select the entity for path analysis.
information.pathSessionDefInfo: Set the length of the path analysis session, only the events within the session range will be counted
information.pathNodeTypeInfo: Select the node type, which supports events, screens, or pages as path nodes.
information.pathStartNodeInfo: Select a node as a starting point for path analysis.
information.pathNodeSelectionInfo: Select the nodes participating in the path analysis. Nodes not selected will not be counted or classified as other.
information.pathIncludeOtherInfo: Events not selected will be counted and categorized as other.
information.pathMergeNodeInfo: Nodes that are repeated continuously in the same session will be merged into a single node statistic.
information.retentionMetricInfo: Select starting and returning events, support filtering event with parameter.
information.introducingAnalyticsContent: Analytics allow you explore the clickstream data on an easy-to-use UI, and provides access to all reports and dashboards.
information.groupApplyToFirstInfo: The grouping will be applied to the first step only, and the grouping will not be applied to the subsequent steps.
